description: This super flavorful and comforting Vegetarian Matzo Ball Soup is just what you need to fight the winter blues. Made from scratch, no chicken, no boxed broth, no bouillon cubes needed!
name: The Best Vegetarian Matzah Ball Soup
recipeIngredient: 16 fresh shiitake mushrooms, thoroughly washed, stems and caps separated and caps sliced
1 to 1 1/2 tsp salt ( adjust to taste)
1 head of garlic, unpeeled, cut in half width wise
1 pack of matzah ball mix, prepared according to directions (you can also use a recipe like this)

recipeInstructions.text: FIND THE INSTRUCTIONS FOR THIS RECIPE FOR THE BEST VEGETARIAN MATZO BALL SOUP HERE AT THE NOSHER
